VIII.ii.1.C.2.a
.
Proper Coding for Undiagnosed Illnesses and MUCMIs
In order to properly identify and track disabilities for which SC is awarded or denied, regional offices (ROs) must properly code the undiagnosed disabilities and MUCMIs in the Veterans Benefits Management System - Ratings (VBMS-R) by assigning the
88 DC modifier, and
Environmental Hazard in Gulf War
special issue.
Reference
:Â  For more information on assigning a special issue in VBMS-R, see the
VBMS-R User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Rating Presumptive Service Connection (SC) Claims for Persian Gulf Veterans
citation: Part VIII, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
